Title: Multistorey (2)
Plot: Boyd struggles with his past while continuing the investigation on a mass murderer who was also guilty of killing his close friend. Are the Gunman's claims of innocence true? As the team investigate it looks as if someone else may have been involved.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Contains violence and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Saskia Wickham,  Russell Wilcox,  Kim Vithana,  Ony Uhiara,  Joseph  Tremain,  Robert Pugh,  Jonathan Phillips,  Clarke Peters,  Sean Pertwee,  Cliff Parisi,  Tim  Mills,  Andrew Lewis,  Claire Johnston,  Raji Ja
